patterns: I want to learn something new
Do you know any interesting facts?
responses: A single cloud can weigh more than a million pounds!
A bolt of lightning is five times hotter than the surface of the sun.
Some cats are allergic to humans!
The inventor of the Frisbee was turned into a Frisbee after he died.
A blue whale's heart is so big, a human could swim through its arteries.
It rains diamonds on Jupiter and Saturn.
The inventor of Pringles is now buried in a Pringles can.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
You can't hum while holding your nose closed.
There's a species of jellyfish that can live forever.
Sea otters hold hands while sleeping to keep from drifting apart.
The hashtag symbol is technically called an 'octothorpe'.
Humans share 60% of their DNA with bananas.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all the world's beaches.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins can.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Cows have best friends and can become stressed when they are separated.
In Switzerland, it's illegal to own just one guinea pig because they get lonely.
The average person will spend six months of their life waiting for red lights to turn green.
Kangaroos can't walk backward.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Honey never spoils.
The longest place name in the world is 85 letters long.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time, approximately 1/100th of a second.
The heart of a shrimp is located in its head.
Bees can recognize human faces.
A snail can sleep for three years.
The world's largest desert is Antarctica.
Sharks are older than trees.
A group of owls is called a 'parliament'.
The dot over the letters 'i' and 'j' is called a tittle.
A small child could swim through the veins of a blue whale.

I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I? (Answer: An echo)
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I? (Answer: Footsteps)
What has keys but can't open locks? (Answer: A piano)
I'm tall when I'm young, and I'm short when I'm old. What am I? (Answer: A candle)
I have branches, but no fruit, trunk, or leaves. What am I? (Answer: A bank)
I can travel around the world while staying in the same spot. What am I? (Answer: A Stamp)

patterns: Can you recommend a good movie?
I need a movie to watch.
What TV show do you recommend?
Tell me a good TV show to watch.
What's a good show to binge?
responses: If you love action, I'd recommend 'Taken' or 'John Wick'!
How about a classic? 'The Godfather' is always a good pick.
For a gripping drama, you could try 'Breaking Bad' or 'The Crown'.
If you're into comedy, 'The Office' or 'Parks and Recreation' are excellent choices!
I think you'll enjoy 'Stranger Things' if you like a mix of mystery and sci-fi.
If you're in the mood for a thriller, 'Interstellar' or 'Gone Girl' would be great choices.
For something lighthearted, 'Friends', 'Modern Family' or 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine' is perfect for a laugh.
If you're looking for a psychological drama, 'You' on Netflix is great!

patterns: What music should I listen to?
What should I listen to right now?
What's a good song to listen to?
responses: If you like pop music, you should check out 'Blinding Lights' by The Weeknd!
For some classic rock vibes, 'Bohemian Rhapsody' by Queen is a must-listen.
If you're into chill music, 'Sunflower' by Post Malone & Swae Lee is perfect for a relaxed mood.
For something upbeat, try 'Uptown Funk' by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars.
If you're in the mood for indie music, 'Electric Feel' by MGMT is a great choice!
Try 'Levitating' by Dua Lipa if you're looking for a catchy and energetic tune.
If you're into rap, 'Sicko Mode' by Travis Scott will definitely get you in the groove.
For a laid-back acoustic vibe, listen to 'Thinking Out Loud' by Ed Sheeran.
